Title: Includes certain programs and facilities in the definition of provider or provider agency
Summary: Includes organizations and programs that provide community based services to individuals under twenty-one in the definition of provider or provider agency regarding the statewide central register of child abuse and maltreatment.
LawCode: Amd ยง424-a, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to including certain programs and facilities in the definition of provider or provider agency
